PC1
ip 10.49.8.1/24 10.49.8.6

PC2
ip 10.49.9.2/24 10.49.9.6 

PC3
ip 10.49.11.3/24 10.49.11.6

PC4
ip 10.49.10.4/24 10.49.10.6

PC5
ip 194.45.100.6 255.255.255.0 194.45.100.5

PC6
ip 194.45.100.7 255.255.255.0 194.45.100.5


PC1> dhcp
DORA IP 10.49.8.2/24 GW 10.49.8.6

PC2> dhcp
DORA IP 10.49.9.1/24 GW 10.49.9.6

PC3> dhcp
DDORA IP 10.49.11.1/24 GW 10.49.11.6

PC4> dhcp
DDORA IP 10.49.10.1/24 GW 10.49.10.6
